description:
Goff Law Group is a personal injury law office in New Haven, Connecticut. This location is part of a network of offices that extends across the state. We accept cases regarding wrongful death, workers' compensation, trucking accidents, car accidents, animal bites, medical malpractice and more.

Our mission is to advocate for injured people and their families. We understand how confusing and intimidating it is to go up against huge insurance companies, employers and corporations. We help fight back.

Focus On Communication

One of the things our clients appreciate most is our responsiveness. We are available at all times of the day via a variety of communication methods.

What our clients do not necessarily always see is the internal system at our law office. We provide the best possible results by keeping in touch with our other team members. We quickly and efficiently make use of all of our collective knowledge when it matters most.

Focus On Results

Tenacity is another one of our defining attributes. We take cases that we believe we can resolve. We stand firm in that belief, even if the case becomes complex enough to go to trial. Our dedicated, measured approach has led over 99 percent of our cases ending in fair settlements or court decisions.

Focus On Service

To provide the best possible service, we need to get to know our prospective clients first. To that end, Goff Law Group offers free initial consultations. Video conferencing is available at our law office.
